item.title: Crisis and emergency risk messaging in mass media news stories: Is the public getting the information they need to protect their health?
item.description:
Parmer J, Baur C, Eroglu D, Lubell K, Prue C, Reynolds B, Weaver J.
Health Commun. 2016 Mar 3:1-8.
